title: RRRPG - Rock'n Roll Racing Password Generator
description: To all fans of Rock'n Roll Racing. Have a full control over your character and car!
Pick the desired level, character, car, choose ammunition, armor and the amount of money you want,
and the app will generate the password for you. Then go to the game and just enter it. Enjoy
contribution: The whole development from scratch. Password generation algorithms have been inferred experimentally
technologies: Written using pure WinAPI in Delphi language
